articles.title: Wedbush Calls Microsoft (MSFT) a Core AI Winner With $625 Price Target
articles.mainIdea: Wedbush Calls Microsoft (MSFT) a Core AI Winner With $625 Price Target
articles.summary: Insider Monkey: Wedbush Calls Microsoft (MSFT) a Core AI Winner With $625 Price Target. Microsoft Corporation (NASDAQ:MSFT) is one of the AI Stocks Making Waves on Wall Street. On December 22, Wedbush reiterated the stock as “Outperform,” with a $625 price target. The firm believes that the stock is a “core winner,” likely to surprise Wall Street with the strength of its AI-driven growth. “Microsoft remains a core winner […]

articles.title: H.C. Wainwright Reaffirms Buy on WhiteFiber (WYFI) Following Nscale Agreement
articles.mainIdea: H.C. Wainwright Reaffirms Buy on WhiteFiber (WYFI) Following Nscale Agreement
articles.summary: Insider Monkey: H.C. Wainwright Reaffirms Buy on WhiteFiber (WYFI) Following Nscale Agreement. WhiteFiber, Inc. (NASDAQ:WYFI) is one of the AI Stocks Making Waves on Wall Street. On December 22, H.C. Wainwright reiterated a “Buy” rating on the stock with a $34.00 price target. The rating affirmation follows the company’s announcement of a major colocation agreement with Nscale, validating its fast-deploy model. articles.title: Tech groups shift $120bn of AI data centre debt off balance sheets

articles.summary: Financial Times: Tech groups shift $120bn of AI data centre debt off balance sheets. Tech companies have moved more than $120bn of data centre spending off their balance sheets using special purpose vehicles funded by Wall Street...
